entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to rain or drizzle this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
